## This project is intended to learn the nitty gritty details of Graph Neural Network from scratch

### Setup Instructions:

- Install `uv` if you havent: 
    - Linux: `curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh`
    - Windows: `powershell -ExecutionPolicy ByPass -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | iex"`
- Clone the repository: `git clone https://github.com/Subhajit-Paul/learn-gnn-from-scratch-FCPS.git`
- Change Directory: `cd learn-gnn-from-scratch-FCPS`
- Create and  Activate virtual environment: 
    - Linux: `uv venv && source .venv/bin/activate`
    - Windows: `uv venv` then `./venv/scripts/activate`
- Install the packages: `uv sync`
